messages.message:
Hey! For anyone trying to use LLMs in refiner, We made some critical bug fixes and enhancements around long-lived indices. Please make sure to:

1. Upgrade your sandbox to 23.07.11 (this is the latest certified release and will be pushed to instabase.com (http://instabase.com) tomorrow 9/12)
2. Confirm you're using ibllm version 1.1.20 and ib_llm_tools 0.0.8
3. Make sure your infra is set up correctly (by following these steps (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/PROD/pages/2080178179/Enabling+LLMs+in+Refiner+in+23.07))
Additional details on the latest release in this slack thread (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CTZCW6N5U/p1694205614957439) and please reference the confluence documentation (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/PROD/pages/2080178179/Enabling+LLMs+in+Refiner+in+23.07) for any additional questions.
